languages.text: "Тебе на роду написано быть готи, проклятой душой, знающейся с духами. Хотел бы Всеотец тебе иного пути, сплел бы судьбу получше. Не противься року".
"You are fated to be a gothi, a cursed soul who knows the spirits. If the Allfather had wanted a different path for you, he would have woven you a better fate. Do not defy destiny."
languages.original_text: "Тебе на роду написано быть готи, проклятой душой, знающейся с духами. Хотел бы Всеотец тебе иного пути, сплел бы судьбу получше. Не противься року".

traits.locale_text: "You are fated to be a gothi, a cursed soul who knows the spirits. If the Allfather had wanted a different path for you, he would have woven you a better fate. Do not defy destiny."
"You are fated to be a gothi, a cursed soul who knows the spirits. If the Allfather had wanted a different path for you, he would have woven you a better fate. Do not defy destiny."
"You are fated to be a gothi, a cursed soul who knows the spirits. If the Allfather had wanted a different path for you, he would have woven you a better fate. Do not defy destiny."
"You are fated to be a gothi, a cursed soul who knows the spirits. If the Allfather had wanted a different path for you, he would have woven you a better fate. Do not defy destiny."

languages.text: “你命中注定要成为一位萨满，一位与精魂沟通的受诅灵魂。如果全父想让你踏上不同的道路，他从一开始就会为你编织更合适的命运。不要反抗命运。”
languages.original_text: "You are fated to be a gothi, a cursed soul who knows the spirits. If the Allfather had wanted a different path for you, he would have woven you a better fate. Do not defy destiny."

traits.locale_text: “你命中注定要成为一位萨满，一位与精魂沟通的受诅灵魂。如果全父想让你踏上不同的道路，他从一开始就会为你编织更合适的命运。不要反抗命运。”

languages.text: « Vous allez devenir une gothi, une âme maudite capable de communiquer avec les esprits. Si le Père de Tous en avait voulu autrement, il vous aurait prévu une autre voie. N'allez pas à l'encontre de votre destinée. »
languages.original_text: "You are fated to be a gothi, a cursed soul who knows the spirits. If the Allfather had wanted a different path for you, he would have woven you a better fate. Do not defy destiny."

traits.locale_text: « Vous allez devenir une gothi, une âme maudite capable de communiquer avec les esprits. Si le Père de Tous en avait voulu autrement, il vous aurait prévu une autre voie. N'allez pas à l'encontre de votre destinée. »

languages.text: «Es su destino ser una gothi, un alma maldita que conoce a los espíritus. Si el Padre de todas las cosas quisiera otra cosa, le habría preparado un destino diferente. No desafíe al destino».
languages.original_text: "You are fated to be a gothi, a cursed soul who knows the spirits. If the Allfather had wanted a different path for you, he would have woven you a better fate. Do not defy destiny."

traits.locale_text: «Es su destino ser una gothi, un alma maldita que conoce a los espíritus. Si el Padre de todas las cosas quisiera otra cosa, le habría preparado un destino diferente. No desafíe al destino».

languages.text: 「お前はゴティになる宿命だ、霊を感じる呪われた魂になるんだ。全知の父が別の道をお望みだったなら、マシな運命を編み上げてくださったはずだ。運命に抗うな」
languages.original_text: "You are fated to be a gothi, a cursed soul who knows the spirits. If the Allfather had wanted a different path for you, he would have woven you a better fate. Do not defy destiny."

traits.locale_text: 「お前はゴティになる宿命だ、霊を感じる呪われた魂になるんだ。全知の父が別の道をお望みだったなら、マシな運命を編み上げてくださったはずだ。運命に抗うな」

languages.text: "Ihr seid dazu bestimmt, ein Gothi zu werden, eine verfluchte Seele, welche die Geister kennt. Hätte der Allvater einen anderen Pfad für Euch gewollt, so hätte er Euch ein besseres Schicksal gewoben. Widersetzt Euch der Bestimmung nicht."
languages.original_text: "You are fated to be a gothi, a cursed soul who knows the spirits. If the Allfather had wanted a different path for you, he would have woven you a better fate. Do not defy destiny."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid dazu bestimmt, ein Gothi zu werden, eine verfluchte Seele, welche die Geister kennt. Hätte der Allvater einen anderen Pfad für Euch gewollt, so hätte er Euch ein besseres Schicksal gewoben. Widersetzt Euch der Bestimmung nicht."

languages.original_text: "You are fated to be a gothi, a cursed soul who knows the spirits. If the Allfather had wanted a different path for you, he would have woven you a better fate. Do not defy destiny."

languages.text: "Gothi olmak senin kaderinde var, ruhları tanıyan lanetli bir ruhsun. Yücebaba senin için farklı bir yol çizmek isteseydi sana daha iyi bir kader bahşederdi. Kaderine karşı gelme."
languages.original_text: "You are fated to be a gothi, a cursed soul who knows the spirits. If the Allfather had wanted a different path for you, he would have woven you a better fate. Do not defy destiny."

traits.locale_text: "Gothi olmak senin kaderinde var, ruhları tanıyan lanetli bir ruhsun. Yücebaba senin için farklı bir yol çizmek isteseydi sana daha iyi bir kader bahşederdi. Kaderine karşı gelme."
